definitions.definition: Without fault or weakness ; incapable of error or fallacy .
examples: He knows about many things, but even he is not infallible .

definitions.definition: Certain to produce the intended effect; sure .
examples: Try this infallible cure for hiccups.

main_definition: Without fault or weakness ; incapable of error or fallacy .
secondary_definitions: Certain to produce the intended effect; sure .
